book.title: Chicken Clucky's Musical Instruments Collection
book.style: black-and-white coloring page, kid-friendly, thick clean outlines, minimal detail, high contrast, no grayscale, no text
book.negative: color, grey, shading, gradients, tiny patterns, cluttered backgrounds, logos, watermarks, photorealism, text, numbers, letters, words
book.cover_prompt: yellow chicken with red comb with tiny apron in Magic Garden; treasure map with X mark floating nearby; singing flowers in background; fruit trees at sides; simple composition, large shapes, kid-friendly
book.back_blurb: Join Chicken Clucky on a wonderful collections adventure in Magic Garden!

pages.text: Welcome to Chicken Clucky's musical instruments adventure!
pages.scene: yellow chicken with red comb with tiny apron standing at entrance; welcome sign with pictures; singing flowers framing scene

pages.text: Look! Chicken Clucky found a Lion!
pages.scene: yellow chicken with red comb pointing at proud lion with mane; sitting on rock with tail swishing; tiny apron visible; simple background with fountain center

pages.text: Chicken Clucky learned about so many wonderful things!
